name: Reel Black Studios
address: Brooklyn, NY (Specific street address not publicly available)
description: Reel Black Studios is a Black-owned creative animation studio run by Dara King and Chris Fequiere. They create animations for brands, agencies, and TV studios, and are known for their work on projects like the short film "Burning Rubber."

name: Bwa Studios
description: BWA Studios is a Black female-owned animation house that creates and produces programming and content for all platforms. They focus on building equity in the animation industry by consciously recruiting Black women, women of color, and nonbinary people of color

name: Luminous Studios
description: Luminous Studios is an innovative animation studio in New York specializing in 2D and 3D animation, visual effects, and motion graphics for corporate videos, commercials, and TV shows

name: Indigo Productions
description: Indigo Productions is a New York-based video production company focusing on corporate video production, film production, video editing, and post-production services

name: DD.NYC®
description: DD.NYC® is a multimedia production company specializing in Keynote presentations, animations, and branding, known for its project management and creative storytelling

name: Wolf&Whale
description: Wolf&Whale is a multimedia production company specializing in corporate video production and film editing, praised for its meticulous project management and collaborative approach

name: Casual
description: Casual is a multimedia production company specializing in video production, videography, and video editing, known for its professionalism, creativity, and project management

name: Colormatics
description: Colormatics is a multimedia production company specializing in videography, video editing, and film production, recognized for professional project management and timely delivery

name: Melty Cone Video
description: Melty Cone Video is a multimedia production company specializing in video production, cinematography, and post-production services, with a focus on corporate video production and film editing

name: FEVR
address: NY (Specific street address not publicly available)
description: FEVR is recognized as a leading 3D animation studio in New York City, specializing in transforming complex subjects into clear and compelling visual stories, with expertise in 3D medical animation
